name: Save new paid Shopify orders to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: When a new order is paid in Shopify, the data from Shopify order are sent to Google Sheets. In this scenario [this spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/12tX9VN0vj-RxS-KKodVLms1GkAkRsrRN0R9J1T5Ece8/edit?usp=sharing) was used.
